Discover how you can get involved with civil liberties.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

ACLU-PA Legal Director Witold 'Vic' Walczak will discuss civil liberties in the age of Trump as the keynote speaker at the ACLU of Pennsylvania Central Susquehanna Chapter Annual Awards Dinner on Sunday, March 31.

Buy your tickets by Saturday, March 16, to ensure that you will be a part of an engaging night of food, drinks, mingling, and the chance to hear about how we are defending constitutional freedoms against the current administration.

Central Susquehanna Chapter 2019 Annual Awards Dinner

Join the ACLU of Pennsylvania Central Susquehanna Chapter for the 2019 Annual Awards Dinner featuring ACLU-PA Legal Director Witold ‘Vic’ Walczak as the keynote speaker.

Sunday, March 31, 4 – 7 p.m.
Front Street Station
2 Front Street
Northumberland, PA

Buy Tickets

We will honor the following individuals with awards: Sobhi and Sonia Ammar will receive the Rev. Mark M. McCullough, Jr. Religious Leadership Award, Penn Garvin to receive the Clyde Peeling Critical Thinker Award, Dwayne J. Heisler receiving the Keri L. Albright Community Catalyst Award, and Dennis Lyons receiving the Dr. Walter B. Brasch Journalism Award.

Reservations for the event are required and must be submitted by March 16. This event is open to the public. No walk-ins will be accepted at the door. Dinners are $25.00 (includes sales tax and 18% gratuity).

We look forward to seeing you there.

ACLU of Pennsylvania
